name: talenttrace-fullstack
description: TalentTrace - Plataforma completa de experiencias laborales

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && serve -s frontend/build
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/build frontend/node_modules node_modules
